entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 early this evening then light late this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 30 April 2023
